tag_list: friendcaller, c2call, android, iphone, ipod, ipad, webphone, facebook, application
overview: FriendCaller is powered by C2Call GmbH, based in Werl, Germany, a pioneer in next-generation browser-based VoIP solutions for the cloud. FriendCaller is a browser-based “Internet phone” offering unique capabilities that can establish peer-to-peer connections through any Internet browser, without the need for pre-installed software. FriendCaller applications is availablefor widely popular iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch, Android OS, WebPhone and Nokia Series 40. Facebook App is also available to call directly from your facebook account.
